posts.post_content:
hello

have done real well on the board being able to make deals with my most recent purchases (thanks all who have helped or i have made a deal with)  Figure i would put a list out and see how i do.  Plus not making the chantilly show so...

looking to add 1 or 2 of these to my collection right now

let me know what you have and price

Ty Cobb Green
Ty Cob Bat off
